original_text: Before him there was no king like him, who turned to the Lord with all his heart and with all his soul and with all his might, according to all the Law of Moses, nor did any like him arise after him.
korean_text: 요시야와 같이 마음을 다하며 뜻을 다하며 힘을 다하여 모세의 모든 율법을 따라 여호와께로 돌이킨 왕은 요시야 전에도 없었고 후에도 그와 같은 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: Before him there was no king like him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 전에는 그와 같은 왕이 없었고,

sentences.original_text: according to all the Law of Moses,
nor did any like him arise after him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그와 같은 왕이 다시는 없었더라.
